text: Mr. Chump is a 1938 American comedy film directed by William Clemens and written by George Bricker. The film stars Johnnie Davis, Lola Lane, Penny Singleton, Donald Briggs, Chester Clute and Frank Orth. The film was released by Warner Bros. on August 8, 1938. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Johnnie Davis as Bill Small *Lola Lane as Jane Mason *Penny Singleton as Betty Martin *Donald Briggs as Jim Belden *Chester Clute as Ed Mason *Frank Orth as Sheriff Frank Hinton *Granville Bates as Abner Sprague *Spencer Charters as Mr. Koeper ==References== ==External links== * Category:1938 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American comedy films Category:1938 comedy films Category:Warner Bros. films Category:Films directed by William Clemens Category:American black-and-white films
title: Mr. Chump
